collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines our practices
regarding the collection, use, and protection of personal information we
receive from users of our site.
We collect contact and payment information from our users.

However, we do not
collect demographic information such as age or gender.

​

The information collected is used for the following purposes:  
data about website traffic and interaction.

We collect and process personal data only for lawful purposes, such as
providing our services, fulfilling contractual obligations, improving our
services, and complying with legal requirements.

The personal data we collect
includes, but is not limited to, names, addresses, email addresses, and
payment information.

Consistent with this Act, we do not knowingly collect, use, or disclose
personal information from children under 13 without obtaining prior parental
consent.

Information Collection from Children Under 13

If we collect personal information from children under 13, we will do so in
compliance with COPPA.

This includes obtaining verifiable parental consent
before collecting, using, or disclosing any personal information from a child.

Parental Rights

Parents have the right to review and delete their child's personal information
from our records, and to refuse to permit further collection or use of their
child's information.
sharing: We do not sell, rent, or lease our user lists to third parties.

While we may
contact you regarding offerings from third parties, your contact information
is not shared with these entities.

Data Transfers

Personal data may be stored or processed outside of the EU by us or our third-
party service providers.

Consistent with this Act, we do not knowingly collect, use, or disclose
personal information from children under 13 without obtaining prior parental
consent.

This includes obtaining verifiable parental consent
before collecting, using, or disclosing any personal information from a child.
